aboutMe.title: About TangMo
aboutMe.imageAlt: Pwacehowdew dwawing of TangMo dog nibbwing on a watewmewon
aboutMe.para: Hewwo! I’m a wowf fwom Thaiwand, wiving faw fwom home. Da name, TangMo, witewawwy twanswates to “watewmewon”. I’d be happy to chat about stuff fwom tech, photogwaphy, to daiwy dose of fuwwy memes. Being “wewativewy” new to da fandom, it’s nice to meet evewyone.

aboutChara.title: About da chawactew
aboutChara.para: I just finished putting cowows on a tempwate wefewence sheet; hazn't made a pwopew one. But uu can take a wook at this one nuw! Othew images on this site awe owdew pwacehowdew doodwe that hazn't been updated.

booking.title: Book My Body!
booking.intro: Want to pway with me? Pewhaps in pwivate? Wequest booking hewe!
booking.form_info: What do uu want to do to me uwu?
booking.form_notice: Once uu submit da fowm, I wiww weview da wequest and send uu quotation on Tewegwam.

result.title: Eww…
result.content: You might haz taken da joke too sewiouswy. But if uu awe weawwy bowed, uu feew fwee to come {link}.
